docs.text: INDEX ¶ welcome to the moonrise wiki! this is an unofficial, member-run repository of the site's plot development, subplots, and miscellaneous snippets of lore. please continue to refer to information available on the site for official and core information — this is just intended to try to gather all the information into a single place to better facilitate plotting (and theorycrafting). if you wish to add in material relevant to your character, whether it's a subplot, faction, or anything that was missed out, feel free to dm lav about it! key site links ¶ ic site timeline spell database site ooc timeline ¶ patch 1.0 — 1.3 ¶ missions: mission cycle 001 — the dragon has three heads jan 2022 events: winter solstice celebrations fire and ice ooc introductions patch 2.0 — 2.7 ¶ missions: mission cycle 002 — places that you don't belong jan — feb 2022 mission cycle 003 — the road not taken feb — mar 2022 mission cycle 004 — your heart's got teeth apr — may 2022 mission cycle 005 — interlude may — jul 2022 events: cad takeover six-pointed star karaoke night pegasus afterparty augury of the phoenix patch 3.0 — 3.x? ¶ missions: mission cycle 006 — blame game jul — aug 2022 mission cycle 007 — wolf in sheep's clothing aug — nov 2022 events: novice exchange program silverwing gala dev notes for lav ¶ git status git add --all git commit -m "commit message here" git push
docs.title: INDEX

docs.text: welcome to the moonrise wiki! this is an unofficial, member-run repository of the site's plot development, subplots, and miscellaneous snippets of lore. please continue to refer to information available on the site for official and core information — this is just intended to try to gather all the information into a single place to better facilitate plotting (and theorycrafting). if you wish to add in material relevant to your character, whether it's a subplot, faction, or anything that was missed out, feel free to dm lav about it!

docs.text: NPC THREADS ¶ MAIN SITE PLOT ¶ FIRE AND ICE ¶ overview details JANUARY 2022 — LOCATION tag relevant npcs brief thread summary here. details of thread go here. THE DRAGON HAS THREE HEADS ¶ overview details EARLY FEBRUARY 2022 — LOCATION tag relevant npcs brief thread summary here. details of thread go here. TO KEEP THE WOLVES AT BAY ¶ overview details LATE FEBRUARY 2022 — LOCATION tag relevant npcs brief thread summary here. details of thread go here. PLACES THAT YOU DON'T BELONG ¶ overview details LATE FEBRUARY 2022 — LOCATION tag relevant npcs brief thread summary here. details of thread go here. IGNITION PT. I, EPILOGUE ¶ overview details APRIL 2022 — DOWNTOWN DELPHI DMITRI WISBANE FARAH SERIZAWA CAIN DELACOUR EMMA brief thread summary here. details of thread go here. MINOR NPC QUESTS ¶ SNAKES IN EDEN ¶ overview details JULY 2022 — THE BLIND MONKEY, DELPHI DOCKS MINOR NPC QUEST ezekiel belgrass brief thread summary here. a follow-up from a cycle 002 mission , where queenie and maddox recover a set of coded documents from a traitor's house. the garden of eden agreement outlines an agreement between sybaris and cerberus , where sybaris hunted down hydra survivors after the great war . it is the successor to operation juliette , a relentless persecution of hydra and hydra sympathisers that lasts for seven years. the eden agreement is renewed every five years . possessing these documents have allowed hydra to identify witches killed from this agreement, understand that hydra traitors have been used to oversee it, and a potential framework of what compliance entails for sybaris. hydra has been dedicating a notable amount of present resources to investigating pegasus and sybaris , considering them unknown variables in a new world. PERSONAL & TIE-INS ¶ MERCHANT OF VENICE ¶ overview details APRIL 2022 — AELMOR, WEST SALEM SEA DMITRI WISBANE TIE-IN: SERAFIM brief thread summary here. thread details go here. THREAD TITLE ¶ overview details MONTH 2022 — LOCATION PERSONAL NPC NAME brief thread summary here. thread details go here.

docs.text: overview details JULY 2022 — THE BLIND MONKEY, DELPHI DOCKS MINOR NPC QUEST ezekiel belgrass brief thread summary here. a follow-up from a cycle 002 mission , where queenie and maddox recover a set of coded documents from a traitor's house. the garden of eden agreement outlines an agreement between sybaris and cerberus , where sybaris hunted down hydra survivors after the great war . it is the successor to operation juliette , a relentless persecution of hydra and hydra sympathisers that lasts for seven years. the eden agreement is renewed every five years . possessing these documents have allowed hydra to identify witches killed from this agreement, understand that hydra traitors have been used to oversee it, and a potential framework of what compliance entails for sybaris. hydra has been dedicating a notable amount of present resources to investigating pegasus and sybaris , considering them unknown variables in a new world.

docs.text: CERBERUS ¶ MISSION CYCLES ¶ 001 — MAGIQAL MAYHEM ¶ overview OCTOBER 2021 — VARIOUS LOCATIONS with the council of delphi declaring magiq illegal, cerberus sends its witches out to apprehend reported shipments. 002 — HELIOS NEXT ¶ overview JANUARY 2022 — VARIOUS LOCATIONS cerberus commences this year's helios next externship program, assigning young witches to cerberus alumni for grimoire research and writing. 003 — HIGHWAY TO HELL ¶ overview player involvement APRIL 2022 — THE WILDERNESS a small group of rogue witches known as the highwaymen are capitalising on the increase in broom usage after the events of the cad takeover , terrorising travellers between eclipse and delphi. TEDDY & TOMOMI PLAYED by BEAU & SHO while waiting for law enforcement to arrive, an elderly human woman named miss marbel complains about local politics: the decision to host n.e.p. in eclipse, how magic is a curse , how the now-disappeared rowenna 1 would never have let that happen… MILO & AIDEN PLAYED by PAN & KIMMY they successfully apprehend some of the highwaymen, but are swiftly escorted away by a squadron of hunters . two weeks later, a cerberus funeral is announced: an entire squadron has been wiped out in the depths of the jairwood . a name without a face . who is rowenna? what is her connection with eclipse? why has she disappeared? ↩
docs.title: CERBERUS

docs.title: 003 — HIGHWAY TO HELL

docs.text: HYDRA ¶ MISSION CYCLES ¶ 001 — REGROUP, PT. I ¶ overview player involvement OCTOBER 2021 — VARIOUS LOCATIONS hydra begins to rebuild its databases, asking its members to supply detailed schematics of delphi's infrastructure. HA-YOON & MADDOX PLAYED BY PAN & LAV while casing out the old citadel, the two notice the hints of a breeze from within the citadel's hidden underground tunnels. 002 — REGROUP, PT. II ¶ overview player involvement JANUARY 2022 — VARIOUS LOCATIONS hydra hunts down some remaining traitors from the great war , intent on sending a message. HA-YOON & HELENA PLAYED BY PAN & BANDIT while raiding a mansion, they discover documents coded in scrambled numbers, letters, and ancient runes . the documents bear a distinct emblem of two 'C's back to back, with a narrow 'X' separating them. QUEENIE & MADDOX PLAYED BY RINNY & LAV they find a folder emblazoned with the cerberus crest, labelled 'report on compliance with the eden agreement ' . it mentions previous leaders of sybaris, and ends with dmitri wisbane's name. ERIN & YAZMINE PLAYED BY JUNO & CILA their victim's last words are unsettling. hydra lost the war for a reason, he says. the leviathan betrayed us. 003 — TOTAL CONTROL ¶ overview npcs APRIL 2022 — THE CAD, VARIOUS after phase i hydra's plan with the cad network 1 is deemed successful, an encrypted message from pazuzu 2 invites selected hydra witches to return to the cad network, posing as security personnel to rewire call operator boxes . TIUR MINOR npc appeared in the epilogue of omnes vulnerant . also known as operation nexus . the motives and goals of operation nexus are yet unclear. ↩ the name pazuzu is the code name or title adopted by ezekiel belgrass . ↩
docs.title: HYDRA

QUEENIE & MADDOX PLAYED BY RINNY & LAV they find a folder emblazoned with the cerberus crest, labelled 'report on compliance with the eden agreement ' . it mentions previous leaders of sybaris, and ends with dmitri wisbane's name. docs.text: overview npcs APRIL 2022 — THE CAD, VARIOUS after phase i hydra's plan with the cad network 1 is deemed successful, an encrypted message from pazuzu 2 invites selected hydra witches to return to the cad network, posing as security personnel to rewire call operator boxes . TIUR MINOR npc appeared in the epilogue of omnes vulnerant . also known as operation nexus . the motives and goals of operation nexus are yet unclear. ↩ the name pazuzu is the code name or title adopted by ezekiel belgrass . ↩
docs.title: 003 — TOTAL CONTROL

docs.text: NEUTRAL ¶ MISSION CYCLES ¶ 001 — LOST CHARM ¶ overview minor npcs JANUARY 2022 — VARIOUS LOCATIONS lady costwicks sends out a series of requests for witches to find her missing enchantment trinkets , which have been scattered across delphi city. LADY COSTWICKS MINOR NPC a retired cerberus enchantment specialist. she has a son called charlie , and is the descendant of gammana costwicks , who was known for her spatial enchantments during the great war . 002 — SAFE HAVEN ¶ overview npcs JANUARY 2022 — THE SLUMS, DELPHI the new dawn sponsors witches to conduct home repairs for humans in the slums . LANCE minor npc made an appearance in out of scale . a champion of cerberus, apparently investigating the new dawn and finding it wanting. 003 — IGNITION PT. I ¶ overview npcs APRIL 2022 — DOWNTOWN DELPHI & TARTARUS a series of scheduled protests around the sybaris-STA deal breaks into a violent riot , fuelled by a rise in anti-witch sentiment . this mission cycle has a special epilogue , that involved dmitri wisbane , farah serizawa , cain delacour , and emma . read about it here . 004 — DON'T MAKE WAVES ¶ overview npcs rumours MAY 2022 — WORLD'S END BEACH, DELPHI in preparation for the summer tourist season , the city calls for volunteers to clean up the beach. this year, however, the council asks for volunteering witches not to use their magic, citing concerns over high tensions and rising anti-witch sentiments . LEO VARLEY minor npc made an appearance in i hate sand . an acolyte of cerberus from squadron kappa phi 5 . accompanied a pair of witches from the vale's cavalry . the epilogues of this mission cycle focus on rumours that characters overhear at the beach. in seaglass , trouble seems to be stirring in the vale , with some blaming the monarchists . interestingly, some things hit closer to home — doesn't pythia have its own rulers too, despite floating right above delphi? in community service again , queenie is one of many witches to receive a prophecy after attending the events of the pegasus afterparty . in it, she seems to witness the death of her covenmate, maddox. in clean up, everybody do your part , some speculate about the augury of the phoenix , wondering about the scarred rupture hanging above the cemetery 1 . in washed up like seafoam , rumor has it that cerberus witches were seen at bell's 2 . in stand your ground , some criticise the way in which cerberus frames participation in the upcoming n.e.p. . good in theory, but dubious in execution. what else do you call something that sends its children off to die but a monster ? in claw at your heart , it turns out someone is sailing ghost ships from the vale . empty containers — and plenty of space for stowaways. in cub scouts , there appears to be a shift towards maritime transport , due to frequent delays and breakdowns on the cad. in she sells sea shells , some debate perceptions about mayor verna 3 — a sellout to delphi? to salem as a whole? in tidying of the heart , the abyssal hunters encounter an accrescent , a messenger from the deep, singing a haunting warning about an invasion . in i hate sand , figures dressed in black and gold 4 are escorted by a cerberus witch to retrieve the caelestrix ring that was found by xiomara and vera. the ring is believed to be involved in an on-going investigation . in every day is a festival , a glimpse of an invite-only chat room appears to reveal some conflicting beliefs within members of the new dawn . the cemetery likely refers to the garden of hades , located in the slums. ↩ "bell's" likely refers to bell's bar , a bar in tartarus. it was also involved in the events of no heroes , a personal quest. ↩ mayor kashvi verna is the mayor of eclipse town. ↩ black and gold are the colours of the vale's cavalry . ↩ leo varley was previously encountered during the events of the pegasus afterparty . ↩
docs.title: NEUTRAL

LEO VARLEY minor npc made an appearance in i hate sand . an acolyte of cerberus from squadron kappa phi 5 . accompanied a pair of witches from the vale's cavalry . the epilogues of this mission cycle focus on rumours that characters overhear at the beach. in seaglass , trouble seems to be stirring in the vale , with some blaming the monarchists . interestingly, some things hit closer to home — doesn't pythia have its own rulers too, despite floating right above delphi? in community service again , queenie is one of many witches to receive a prophecy after attending the events of the pegasus afterparty . in it, she seems to witness the death of her covenmate, maddox. in clean up, everybody do your part , some speculate about the augury of the phoenix , wondering about the scarred rupture hanging above the cemetery 1 . in washed up like seafoam , rumor has it that cerberus witches were seen at bell's 2 . in stand your ground , some criticise the way in which cerberus frames participation in the upcoming n.e.p. . good in theory, but dubious in execution. what else do you call something that sends its children off to die but a monster ? in claw at your heart , it turns out someone is sailing ghost ships from the vale . empty containers — and plenty of space for stowaways. in cub scouts , there appears to be a shift towards maritime transport , due to frequent delays and breakdowns on the cad. in she sells sea shells , some debate perceptions about mayor verna 3 — a sellout to delphi? to salem as a whole? in tidying of the heart , the abyssal hunters encounter an accrescent , a messenger from the deep, singing a haunting warning about an invasion . in i hate sand , figures dressed in black and gold 4 are escorted by a cerberus witch to retrieve the caelestrix ring that was found by xiomara and vera. the ring is believed to be involved in an on-going investigation . in every day is a festival , a glimpse of an invite-only chat room appears to reveal some conflicting beliefs within members of the new dawn . the cemetery likely refers to the garden of hades , located in the slums. ↩ "bell's" likely refers to bell's bar , a bar in tartarus. it was also involved in the events of no heroes , a personal quest. ↩ mayor kashvi verna is the mayor of eclipse town. ↩ black and gold are the colours of the vale's cavalry . ↩ leo varley was previously encountered during the events of the pegasus afterparty . ↩
docs.title: 004 — DON'T MAKE WAVES

docs.text: PEGASUS ¶ MISSION CYCLES ¶ 001 — JUBILANT EFFORTS ¶ overview player involvement OCTOBER 2021 — VARIOUS LOCATIONS in preparation for the coven's 50th anniversary , pegasus sends out a series of mission requests to help prepare for the golden jubilee . PHIALE & HYALE PLAYEd by JUNO & Q the twins catch a brief glimpse of a daemon climbing the ravine's walls. it looks strangely humanoid , and smiles as it wanders back into the wilderness, as if it had been inside the city the entire time. 002 — THE CHANGELINGS ¶ overview player involvement JANUARY 2022 — SUIXA, THE WILDERNESS pegasus investigates reports of missing children in a village called suixa . JAE & SERAFIM PLAYED by CILA & LAV the orphanage they investigated bore the claw marks of a daemon attack , yet the daemon they slew a little too easily outside the village had a lair devoid of any signs of a recent meal. some things seem out of place . 003 — WILD THINGS ¶ overview player involvement APRIL 2022 — THE WILDERNESS pegasus witches are deployed to collect data for the decennial update of the mythical beast encyclopaedia , venturing into the wilderness to tag mythical beasts while trying to disrupt the natural environment as little as possible. CHARANI & SERAFIM PLAYED by VODKA & LAV despite the typically joyful atmosphere of the census, the recordkeepers seem unusually despondent , especially when they revealed that they encountered no dragons .
docs.title: PEGASUS

docs.text: SYBARIS ¶ MISSION CYCLES ¶ 001 — PROTECTION RACKET ¶ overview OCTOBER 2021 — THE DOCKS, DELPHI the owner of a jewellery chain situated by the docks offers hefty rewards for a series of protection missions , claiming to have angered hydra and fearing for their safety. 002 — FIGHT CLUB ¶ overview npcs JANUARY 2022 — DOWNTOWN, DELPHI the host of this year's witch wrestling supershow is hiring sybarites to stage magical fights, complete with costumes and storylines. JAMIE LOCKHART minor npc an infamously idle rich kid in sybaris, who hosted this year's witch wrestling supershow . UNKNOWN minor npc made an appearance in a house divided . a witch in the audience who had said contra mundum 1 to jamie, albeit to no effect. 003 — THE MUTINEERS ¶ overview npcs player involvement APRIL 2022 — VARIOUS LOCATIONS with sybaris involvement in the cad services , political tensions are rising, resulting in some internal coven factionalism between dmitri and perseus riker . PERSEUS RIKER minor npc description of npc here. KASIMIR & SIOBHAN PLAYED BY ASH & VODKA rising political tension turns a spar into a stage for public opinion: some sybarites seem to be split between cooperating with the council by signing the aegis accords , while others seem convinced that dmitri would do no such thing . 004 — DEATH AND TAXES, PT. I ¶ overview npcs player involvement MAY 2022 — VARIOUS LOCATIONS this is a snakeskin mission, a type of mission typically handed out when the coven as a whole or its leader has been contracted to do something major , irreversible , and likely involve something illegal . the distributed tasks range from protecting ships , navigating conversations with suppliers regarding ammunition , and destroying certain targets in the vale . DARIUS INFIYA minor npc description of npc here. JULIUS & SERAFIM PLAYED BY PAN & LAV after successfully escorting a ship 2 to the vale after a brief kraken attack, the pair are greeted by darius infiya , who seems to be overseeing some sort of work along the docks. THEA & JACK PLAYED BY RINNY & BEAU the pair impersonate the winged pegasus battalion la'rocha in order to acquire a shipment of hunting arms . unfortunately, they are found out , and the failure is marked upon their records. CORVUS & JACK PLAYED BY KIMMY & BEAU a warehouse owned by mercurio textiles 3 is set ablaze. an article by the vale observer 4 follows up. a name without a face . appears to reflect hydra interest in sybaris, as mentioned in snakes in eden . ↩ established in merchant of venice , an npc tie-in thread between dmitri wisbane and serafim strix . ↩ a large manufactured goods company based in the vale, supplying textiles for brands like hughes, spectra, and jinx. ↩ a major newspaper in the vale. ↩
docs.title: SYBARIS
